details: Relevant Courses: Data and Decision Analytics.

description: Trained under lead financial analyst, creating proposals utilizing Emory's award management system.
Contacted analysts and compared billing limits of grants to authorized limits, ensuring compliance.
Actively participated in monthly staff meetings, contributing insights and ideas.
Collaborated seamlessly with cross-functional team members during high-stress rush hours, maintaining composure.
Consistently monitored inventory levels and updated expiry dates, minimizing waste and ensuring food safety.
Demonstrated commitment by communicating effectively with managers regarding schedules and arriving early for shifts.
Collected and organized data on over 100 basketball clubs nationwide using Excel, enabling targeted marketing efforts.
Managed social media (Twitter) by curating engaging content, growing follower base, and creating posts.
Facilitated seamless execution of basketball tryouts and games for over 700 kids, ensuring a positive experience.
Collaborated with companies like Hoyoverse, coordinating a successful event attended by over 100 students.
Led an executive board of 10 members, hosting monthly events for the general student body.
Spearheaded marketing efforts by creating visually appealing social media graphics and videos, posting on team accounts.

extracurriculars.organization: Emory ASO Leadership Experience Advising Program
description: Planned, budgeted, pitched, and executed cultural, panelist, and social events for over 270 attendees.
Participated in weekly workshops on Asian-American issues, leadership, and professional development.
Tabled twice a month, connecting with undergraduate students and inviting them to events.
Assisted with camera, lighting, and sound operations on student production sets.
Organized video files, synced footage, and selected shots for video editing.
Learned to use video editing software through hands-on workshops.
Planned, set up, and volunteered at indoor and outdoor events for the entire student body of 800.
Created and posted flyers adhering to teacher advisor's guidelines for student council events.
Hosted themed homecoming activities, engaging approximately 400 students.
Trained peers on using audio editing software and conducting interviews for podcasts.
Managed weekly videos and podcast graphics on Instagram, garnering up to 1.3k views per video.
Led monthly brainstorming and research sessions in class.

other.title: Honors & Awards
content: Georgia Scholastic Press Association Podcast Superior (2022)

other.title: Other Activities
content: Northview HS National Chinese Honor Society President
